title: Hawaii: the possible dream
creator_credit: E McGlone and Cate and McGlone Films
brief_description: A tourist eye-view of the islands comprising the Hawaiian chain. Beginning with the famed Waikiki Beach at Honolulu, on the island of Oahu, the varied tourist attractions are visited on Kauai - the Garden Island, Maui - the Valley Island and Hawaii - the Orchid Island, also famed for its extinct and erupting volcanoes.
